Text: @sam12771, just ocurred to me that you more than likley downloaded the first upload of this game; that is not my upload, & that torrent went 404 because of complaints about bugs, this is the clean version of the game which I only started uploading : Saturday 21/01/2012, in the US, it shows up as 2012/01/20, I suspect your trying to download a torrent that is dead, restart your download with this torrent, delete the dead one, this torrent is clean.
